financial_reality.problem_statement: Traditional rock band economics don't work
why_economics_fail: Streaming: ~$0.003/stream means need millions of streams to pay rent (DFDO has sub-1M total across 14 years)
Live shows: $500-2000/gig split 4-5 ways leaves each member with $100-400 (not worth the time investment)
Recording: Expensive and time-consuming, uncertain ROI on new releases
Promotion: Costs money, limited organic reach, algorithms don't favor rock genre
Revenue splits: Even if income increases, splitting 4-5 ways limits individual earnings
Result: Passion project that drains resources instead of generating them

urgency.timeline: Need new revenue model within 3-6 months or members will burn out/quit
